sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Bruce Willis' family has announced that the Hollywood star has frontotemporal dementia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: It comes nearly a year since Willis stepped away from acting after being diagnosed with aphasia, which is a communication disorder.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Frontotemporal dementia is a rare form of the illness, causing problems with behavior and language.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Willis' family have said they hope that any media attention focused on the actor can help shine a light on this disease, which needs, quote, far more awareness and research. Willis' movies have earned more than 5 billion euros at the worldwide box office. While beloved for hits including Die Hard and The Sixth Sense, the prolific actor had in recent years primarily featured in direct-to-video thrillers.
